bitField.name: AHP
bitField.description: Alternative half-precision control bit:

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default NaN mode control bit:

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Flush-to-zero mode control bit:

bitField.name: RMode
bitField.description: Rounding Mode control field.

bitField.name: Stride
bitField.description: This field has no function in AArch64 state, and non-zero values are ignored during execution in AArch64 state. It is included only for context saving and restoration of the AArch32 FPSCR.Stride field.

bitField.name: Len
bitField.description: This field has no function in AArch64 state, and non-zero values are ignored during execution in AArch64 state. It is included only for context saving and restoration of the AArch32 FPSCR.Len field.

bitField.name: IDE
bitField.description: Input Denormal floating-point exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IXE
bitField.description: Inexact floating-point exception trap enable.

bitField.name: UFE
bitField.description: Underflow floating-point exception trap enable.

bitField.name: OFE
bitField.description: Overflow floating-point exception trap enable.

bitField.name: DZE
bitField.description: Divide by Zero floating-point exception trap enable.

bitField.name: IOE
bitField.description: Invalid Operation floating-point exception trap enable.

register.name: FPEXC32_EL2
register.description: Allows access to the AArch32 register FPEXC from AArch64 state only. Its value has no effect on execution in AArch64 state.

bitField.name: EX
bitField.description: Exception bit. In ARMv8, this bit is RAZ/WI.

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: Enables access to the Advanced SIMD and floating-point functionality from all Exception levels, except that setting this field to 0 does not disable the following:

bitField.name: DEX
bitField.description: Defined synchronous exception on floating-point execution.

bitField.name: FP2V
bitField.description: FPINST2 instruction valid bit. In ARMv8, this bit is RES0.

bitField.name: VV
bitField.description: VECITR valid bit. In ARMv8, this bit is RES0.

bitField.name: TFV
bitField.description: Trapped Fault Valid bit. Valid only when the value of FPEXC.DEX is 1. When valid, it indicates the cause of the exception and therefore whether the FPEXC.{IDF, IXF, UFF, OFF, DZF, IOF} bits are valid.

bitField.name: VECITR
bitField.description: Vector iteration count. In ARMv8, this field is RES1.

bitField.name: IDF
bitField.description: Input Denormal trapped exception bit. Valid only when the value of FPEXC.TFV is 1. When valid, it indicates whether an Input Denormal exception occurred while FPSCR.

bitField.name: IXF
bitField.description: Inexact trapped exception bit. Valid only when the value of FPEXC.TFV is 1. When valid, it indicates whether an Inexact exception occurred while FPSCR.

bitField.name: UFF
bitField.description: Underflow trapped exception bit. Valid only when the value of FPEXC.TFV is 1. When valid, it indicates whether an Underflow exception occurred while FPSCR.

bitField.name: OFF
bitField.description: Overflow trapped exception bit. Valid only when the value of FPEXC.TFV is 1. When valid, it indicates whether an Overflow exception occurred while FPSCR.

bitField.name: DZF
bitField.description: Divide by Zero trapped exception bit. Valid only when the value of FPEXC.TFV is 1. When valid, it indicates whether a Divide by Zero exception occurred while FPSCR.

bitField.name: IOF
bitField.description: Invalid Operation trapped exception bit. Valid only when the value of FPEXC.TFV is 1. When valid, it indicates whether an Invalid Operation exception occurred while FPSCR.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Negative condition flag for AArch32 floating-point comparison operations. AArch64 floating-point comparisons set the PSTATE.N flag instead.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Zero condition flag for AArch32 floating-point comparison operations. AArch64 floating-point comparisons set the PSTATE.Z flag instead.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry condition flag for AArch32 floating-point comparison operations. AArch64 floating-point comparisons set the PSTATE.C flag instead.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Overflow condition flag for AArch32 floating-point comparison operations. AArch64 floating-point comparisons set the PSTATE.V flag instead.

bitField.name: QC
bitField.description: Cumulative saturation bit, Advanced SIMD only. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that an Advanced SIMD integer operation has saturated since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: IDC
bitField.description: Input Denormal cumulative floating-point exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Input Denormal floating-point exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: IXC
bitField.description: Inexact cumulative floating-point exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Inexact exception floating-point has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: UFC
bitField.description: Underflow cumulative floating-point exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Underflow floating-point exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: OFC
bitField.description: Overflow cumulative floating-point exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Overflow floating-point exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: DZC
bitField.description: Divide by Zero cumulative floating-point exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Divide by Zero floating-point exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

bitField.name: IOC
bitField.description: Invalid Operation cumulative floating-point exception bit. This bit is set to 1 to indicate that the Invalid Operation floating-point exception has occurred since 0 was last written to this bit.

register.name: MVFR0_EL1
register.gui_name: AArch32 Media and VFP Feature Register 0
register.description: Describes the features provided by the AArch32 Advanced SIMD and Floating-point implementation...

bitField.name: FPRound
bitField.description: Floating-Point Rounding modes. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for rounding modes.

bitField.name: FPShVec
bitField.description: Short Vectors. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for the use of short vectors.

bitField.name: FPSqrt
bitField.description: Square Root. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for the ARMv6 VFP square root operations.

bitField.name: FPDivide
bitField.description: Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for VFP divide operations.

bitField.name: FPTrap
bitField.description: Floating Point Exception Trapping. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for exception trapping.

bitField.name: FPDP
bitField.description: Double Precision. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for double-precision operations.

bitField.name: FPSP
bitField.description: Single Precision. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for single-precision operations.

bitField.name: SIMDReg
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD registers. Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation provides support for the Advanced SIMD and floating-point register bank.

register.name: MVFR1_EL1
register.gui_name: AArch32 Media and VFP Feature Register 1
register.description: Describes the features provided by the AArch32 Advanced SIMD and Floating-point implementation...

bitField.name: SIMDFMAC
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Fused Multiply-Accumulate. Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD implementation provides fused multiply accumulate instructions.

bitField.name: FPHP
bitField.description: Floating Point Half Precision. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDHP
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Half Precision. Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation provides half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDSP
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Single Precision. Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation provides single-precision floating-point instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDInt
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Integer. Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation provides integer instructions.

bitField.name: SIMDLS
bitField.description: Advanced SIMD Load/Store. Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD and floating-point implementation provides load/store instructions.

bitField.name: FPDNaN
bitField.description: Default NaN mode. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support only for the Default NaN mode.

bitField.name: FPFtZ
bitField.description: Flush to Zero mode. Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support only for the Flush-to-Zero mode of operation.

register.name: MVFR2_EL1
register.gui_name: AArch32 Media and VFP Feature Register 2
register.description: Describes the features provided by the AArch32 Advanced SIMD and Floating-point implementation...

bitField.name: FPMisc
bitField.description: Indicates whether the floating-point implementation provides support for miscellaneous VFP features.

bitField.name: SIMDMisc
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD implementation provides support for miscellaneous Advanced SIMD features.

tcf:enumItem.description: IEEE half-precision format selected.
tcf:enumItem.name: IEEE_half_precision_format_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Alternative half-precision format selected.
tcf:enumItem.name: Alternative_half_precision_format_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: NaN operands propagate through to the output of a floating-point operation.
tcf:enumItem.name: NaN_operands_propagate_through_to_the_output_of_a_floating_point_operation

tcf:enumItem.description: Any operation involving one or more NaNs returns the Default NaN.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_operation_involving_one_or_more_NaNs_returns_the_Default_NaN

tcf:enumItem.description: Flush-to-zero mode disabled. Behavior of the floating-point system is fully compliant with the IEEE 754 standard.
tcf:enumItem.name: Flush_to_zero_mode_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Flush-to-zero mode enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Flush_to_zero_mode_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Round to Nearest (RN) mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_to_Nearest_RN_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Round towards Plus Infinity (RP) mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_towards_Plus_Infinity_RP_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Round towards Minus Infinity (RM) mode
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_towards_Minus_Infinity_RM_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Round towards Zero (RZ) mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Round_towards_Zero_RZ_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the FPSR.IDC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the FPSR.IDC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the FPSR.IDC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the FPSR.IXC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the FPSR.IXC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the FPSR.IXC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the FPSR.UFC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the FPSR.UFC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the FPSR.UFC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the FPSR.OFC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the FPSR.OFC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the FPSR.OFC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the FPSR.DZC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the FPSR.DZC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the FPSR.DZC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Untrapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs then the FPSR.IOC bit is set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Untrapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Trapped exception handling selected. If the floating-point exception occurs, the PE does not update the FPSR.IOC bit. The trap handling software can decide whether to set the FPSR.IOC bit to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Trapped_exception_handling_selected

tcf:enumItem.description: Accesses to the FPSCR, and any of the SIMD and floating-point registers Q0-Q15, including their views as D0-D31 registers or S0-S31 registers, are UNDEFINED at all Exception levels.
tcf:enumItem.name: Accesses_to_the_FPSCR_and_any_of_the_SIMD_and_floating_point_registers_Q0_Q15_including_their_views_as_D0_D31_registers_or_S0_S31_registers_are_UNDEFINED_at_all_Exception_levels

tcf:enumItem.description: This control permits access to the Advanced SIMD and floating-point functionality at all Exception levels.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_permits_access_to_the_Advanced_SIMD_and_floating_point_functionality_at_all_Exception_levels

tcf:enumItem.description: The exception was generated by the attempted execution of an unallocated instruction in the encoding space that is identified by the pseudocode function ExecutingCP10or11Instr(). If FPEXC32_EL2.TFV is RW then it is invalid and UNKNOWN. If FPEXC32_EL2.{IDF, IXF, UFF, OFF, DZF, IOF} are RW then they are invalid and UNKNOWN.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_exception_was_generated_by_the_attempted_execution_of_an_unallocated_instruction_in_the_encoding_space_that_is_identified_by_the_pseudocode_function_ExecutingCP10or11Instr

tcf:enumItem.description: The exception was generated during the execution of an unallocated encoding. FPEXC32_EL2.TFV is valid and indicates the cause of the exception.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_exception_was_generated_during_the_execution_of_an_unallocated_encoding

tcf:enumItem.description: The exception was caused by the execution of a floating-point VABS, VADD, VDIV, VFMA, VFMS, VFNMA, VFNMS, VMLA, VMLS, VMOV, VMUL, VNEG, VNMLA, VNMLS, VNMUL, VSQRT, or VSUB instruction when one or both of FPSCR.{Stride, Len} was non-zero. If the FPEXC.{IDF, IXF, UFF, OFF, DZF, IOF} bits are RW then they are invalid and UNKNOWN.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_exception_was_caused_by_the_execution_of_a_floating_point_VABS_VADD_VDIV_VFMA_VFMS_VFNMA_VFNMS_VMLA_VMLS_VMOV_VMUL_VNEG_VNMLA_VNMLS_VNMUL_VSQRT_or_VSUB_instruction_when_one_or_both_of_FPSCR

tcf:enumItem.description: FPEXC.{IDF, IXF, UFF, OFF, DZF, IOF} indicate the presence of trapped floating-point exceptions that had occurred at the time of the exception. Bits are set for all trapped exceptions that had occurred at the time of the exception.
tcf:enumItem.name: FPEXC

tcf:enumItem.description: Input denormal exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Input_denormal_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Input denormal exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Input_denormal_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Inexact exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Inexact_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Inexact exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Inexact_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Underflow exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Underflow_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Underflow exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Underflow_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Overflow exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Overflow_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Overflow exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Overflow_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Divide by Zero exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Divide_by_Zero_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Divide by Zero exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Divide_by_Zero_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Invalid Operation exception has not occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Invalid_Operation_exception_has_not_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Invalid Operation exception has occurred.
tcf:enumItem.name: Invalid_Operation_exception_has_occurred

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented, or only Round to Nearest mode supported, except that Round towards Zero mode is supported for VCVT instructions that always use that rounding mode regardless of the FPSCR setting.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented_or_only_Round_to_Nearest_mode_supported_except_that_Round_towards_Zero_mode_is_supported_for_VCVT_instructions_that_always_use_that_rounding_mode_regardless_of_the_FPSCR_setting

tcf:enumItem.description: All rounding modes supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_rounding_modes_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Short vectors not supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: Short_vectors_not_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Short vector operation supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: Short_vector_operation_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv2.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv2

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv3, VFPv4, or ARMv8. VFPv3 and ARMv8 add an instruction to load a double-precision floating-point constant, and conversions between double-precision and fixed-point values.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv3_VFPv4_or_ARMv8

tcf:enumItem.description: Not supported in hardware.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_supported_in_hardware

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv2.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv2

tcf:enumItem.description: Supported, VFPv3 or VFPv4. VFPv3 adds an instruction to load a single-precision floating-point constant, and conversions between single-precision and fixed-point values.
tcf:enumItem.name: Supported_VFPv3_or_VFPv4

tcf:enumItem.description: The implementation has no Advanced SIMD and floating-point support.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_implementation_has_no_Advanced_SIMD_and_floating_point_support

tcf:enumItem.description: The implementation includes floating-point support with 16 x 64-bit registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_implementation_includes_floating_point_support_with_16_x_64_bit_registers

tcf:enumItem.description: The implementation includes Advanced SIMD and floating-point support with 32 x 64-bit registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_implementation_includes_Advanced_SIMD_and_floating_point_support_with_32_x_64_bit_registers

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Instructions to convert between half-precision and single-precision implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Instructions_to_convert_between_half_precision_and_single_precision_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: As for 0b0001, and also instructions to convert between half-precision and double-precision implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_for_0b0001_and_also_instructions_to_convert_between_half_precision_and_double_precision_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Implemented. This value is permitted only if the SIMDSP field is 0001.
tcf:enumItem.name: Implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Implemented. This value is permitted only if the SIMDInt field is 0001.
tcf:enumItem.name: Implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented, or hardware supports only the Default NaN mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented_or_hardware_supports_only_the_Default_NaN_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Hardware supports propagation of NaN values.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hardware_supports_propagation_of_NaN_values

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented, or hardware supports only the Flush-to-Zero mode of operation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented_or_hardware_supports_only_the_Flush_to_Zero_mode_of_operation

tcf:enumItem.description: Hardware supports full denormalized number arithmetic.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hardware_supports_full_denormalized_number_arithmetic

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented, or no support for miscellaneous features.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented_or_no_support_for_miscellaneous_features

tcf:enumItem.description: Support for Floating-point selection.
tcf:enumItem.name: Support_for_Floating_point_selection

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0001, and Floating-point Conversion to Integer with Directed Rounding modes.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0001_and_Floating_point_Conversion_to_Integer_with_Directed_Rounding_modes

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0010, and Floating-point Round to Integer Floating-point.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0010_and_Floating_point_Round_to_Integer_Floating_point

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0011, and Floating-point MaxNum and MinNum.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0011_and_Floating_point_MaxNum_and_MinNum

tcf:enumItem.description: Not implemented, or no support for miscellaneous features.
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_implemented_or_no_support_for_miscellaneous_features

tcf:enumItem.description: Floating-point Conversion to Integer with Directed Rounding modes.
tcf:enumItem.name: Floating_point_Conversion_to_Integer_with_Directed_Rounding_modes

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0001, and Floating-point Round to Integer Floating-point.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0001_and_Floating_point_Round_to_Integer_Floating_point

tcf:enumItem.description: As 0010, and Floating-point MaxNum and MinNum.
tcf:enumItem.name: As_0010_and_Floating_point_MaxNum_and_MinNum
